alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:51PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Albany County through 415 PM MDT... At 350 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Baldy Peak to Laramie. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Penny to Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laramie and University Of Wyoming War Memorial Stadium. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 305 and 316. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
